Text: FW Big NewsPST See my typical tongueincheek response below Robert W Franksen Real Estate Administration Manager USG CORPORATION South Franklin Street Chicago IL phone fax Original Message From Franksen Robert Sent Monday January PM To Lisa Platter Subject RE Big News WOW Im sure youre not having any premarital as to save that spec ial moment until after the ceremony Robert W Franksen Real Estate Adm inistration Manager USG CORPORATION South Franklin Street Chicago I L phone fax Original Message From Lisa Platter SMTP Se nt Saturday January PM To Betty Johnson Bob Frank sen Gina Zinn Jeff and Rochelle Hirchert Lou and Evelyn Buller Stephani e Jones Subject Big News Dear Friends I hope you all had a w onderful Christmas holidayit went by fast and its always a crazy time The kids had a blast with all of their new gifts and gadgets that requir ed frequent battery installation so the house has been busyand noisy what kind of relative would buy the noisiest toys in the store The b est part of our holiday is that I became engaged on Christmas Eve It was a wonderfully planned proposal and I received a beautiful engagement ring The fellows name is Brad Bailor and he is a wonderful man We are very happy and plan a wedding sometime in July I just couldnt wait to share our news I hope all is well with all of you and Happy New Year Love Lisa

FW Big NewsPST See below but dont let Lisa know I forwarded this on to you Ohisnt life so perfect Robert W Franksen Real Estate Administration Manager USG CORPORATION South Franklin Street Chicago IL phone fax Original Message From Lisa Platter SMTP Sent Saturday January PM To Betty Johnson Bob Franksen Gina Zinn Jeff and Rochelle Hirchert Lou and Evelyn Buller Stephanie Jones Subject Big News Dear Friends I hope you all had a wonderful Christmas holidayit went by fast and its always a crazy time The kids had a blast with all of their new gifts and gadgets that required frequent battery installation so the house has been busyand noisy what kind of relative would buy the noisiest toys in the store The best part of our holiday is that I became engaged on Christmas Eve It was a wonderfully planned proposal and I received a beautiful engagement ring The fellows name is Brad Bailor and he is a wonderful man We are very happy and plan a wedding sometime in July I just couldnt wait to share our news I hope all is well with all of you and Happy New Year Love Lisa

Ski Trip PST I talked to Orhan today and he is waiting to see if you are going skiing with us I can get Orhan a roundtrip ticket for I see you can get a roundtrip ticket on Southwest for Are you boys in or out Robert W Franksen Real Estate Administration Manager USG CORPORATION South Franklin Street Chicago IL phone fax

RE OmahacomPST Are you planning on going skiiing with us I noticed the airfares to Reno from Portland were only about roundtrip Robert W Franksen Real Estate Administration Manager USG CORPORATION South Franklin Street Chicago IL phone fax Original Message From Platter Phillip SMTPPhillip NRONcom Sent Tuesday November PM To Franksen Robert Subject RE Omahacom Hell yes Our Mothers were best friends when we grew up in CB His mother loved us and that created some competitive spirit between us I beat Jeff in th grade in a run for student Council at Hoover We were friends but didnt really like each other if that makes any sense Personally I quit hanging out with him when he wanted to always take our shirts off and wrestle on his sisters bed I thought he was a little weird He did show up to Mitchs visitation which meant alot to me I would support Siegrist Do not forward this to anyone Original Message From Franksen Robert mailto Sent Monday November AM To Platter Phillip Subject Omahacom Omahacomurl Phil do you know this guy indexphpunpudivuhdgusid This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
OmahacomPST Omahacomurl Phil do you know this guy indexphpunpudivuhdgusid

Ski Trip The Aftermath Cc lund wilson hoglund turchi brooks bishop spethman powers barth abbott amfam montgomery marwedePST It was another epic adventure in Lake Tahoe as we had it goin on The skiing was great the scenery fine and the laughs gut wrenching Don and I almost fell off the lift at Squaw Valley from Andys cutting edge humor Here are the top ten lines from Ski Trip Ichibanor is it IchiBob Hey Turch put the yellow side up They must only let you guys out once a year My puppies are burnin Oh Billie Billie Billie One time Come onone time Hey Andy whats that dirty tshirt doing on the floor Alright Tommy well take you to McDonalds Come right now right now I make big big big offa Yan Can Cook Ski Trip is tentatively scheduled for Jan th Feb nd The venue will be Park City Utah More details coming this fall Give me a call for more information and mark your calendars now Robert W Franksen Real Estate Administration Manager USG CORPORATION South Franklin Street Chicago IL phone fax
